alert.note: Alert for Badlands Area; Butte County Area; Custer County Plains; Fall River County Area; Pine Ridge Area; West Central Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 22 at 2:39PM MDT until July 22 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, 316, 317, 322, 325, 326, 327, 329, AND 332... .Hot temperatures in the upper 90s to lower 100s will combine with very dry air, supporting minimum relative humidity of 10 percent or less this afternoon and early evening, with southwest to southeast winds of 20-30 mph. The combination will support critical fire weather conditions. Isolated thunderstorms with very little rainfall will be possible in the late afternoon and early evening. Later tonight, winds will shift northwest behind a cold front, gusting over 40 mph in some areas. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, 316, 317, 322, 325, 326, 327, 329, AND 332... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 314 Northern Campbell, 315 Southern Campbell, 316 Crook County Plains, 317 Weston County Plains, 322 Fall River County Area, 325 Custer County Plains, 326 Pine Ridge Area, 327 Butte County Area, 329 West Central Plains and 332 Badlands Area. * WINDS...South 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 9 percent. * LIGHTNING...Isolated dry thunderstorms will be possible in the early evening. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity will produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Badlands Area; Butte County Area; Custer County Plains; Fall River County Area; Pine Ridge Area; West Central Plains
